author: eptwts
text:
found this app in whops app store today...

you can drop in your "knowledge-base" & users who buy your whop can talk with an AI coach which pulls info from that data

definitely a big value-add to your offering in contrast with a single PDF or video course

can think of 100 ways i'd have utilized this on past ventures if it was possible back in the day

i'm very bullish on AI for education, it's tricky to get right but there's a massive reward for the ones who do
